cit:title.gco:CharacterString: Canadian Integrated Ocean Observing System Metadata Profile of ISO 19115

lan:textGroup.lan:LocalisedCharacterString: Collection des donnés sur le "OTN Halifax Line"

mri:abstract.gco:CharacterString: A Teledyne Webb Research Slocum glider was used to collect oceanographic data along the Halifax line

lan:textGroup.lan:LocalisedCharacterString: Un Teledyne Webb Research Slocum a été utilisé pour recueillir des données océanographiques sur la ligne de Halifax

mcc:description.gco:CharacterString: EPSG::5831 - Instantaneous Water Level depth - Depth relative to instantaneous water level uncorrected for tide. Not specific to any location or epoch.

cit:title.gco:CharacterString: Government of Canada Core Subject Thesaurus

mco:useLimitation.gco:CharacterString: Haven’t applied appropriate QC on the data yet.

lan:textGroup.lan:LocalisedCharacterString: N'ont pas encore appliqué le contrôle de qualité approprié sur les données.

cit:description.gco:CharacterString: ERDDAP's version of the OPeNDAP .html web page for this dataset. Specify a subset of the dataset and download the data via OPeNDAP or in many different file types.

mac:description.gco:CharacterString: Teledyne Webb Research Slocum glider, model G3. Slocum gliders are buoyancy driven profiling underwater vehicles.

mcc:description.gco:CharacterString: Pumped Seabird CTD mounted on the midsection of the glider.
Optical sensor to determine oxygen concentration mounted on the aft end of the glider.
Multispectral irradiance sensor mounted on the midsection of the glider at an angle of 22 degrees from horizontal
Optical sensor to measure CDOM fluorescence and two wavelengths of backscattering
Optical sensor to measure chla fluorescence and two wavelengths of backscattering
